titleStmt.title: Soothing of proverbs: with only true forsooth. In two parts. / By B.N. Gent..
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
Wright, John, d. 1658. printer.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Wright, and are to be sold at his shop without Newgate at the signe of the Bible.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Nicholas Breton by STC (2nd ed.).
The 2d pt. has special t.-p. (on A₇): Soothing of proverbs: with only true forsooth. The second part. By B.N. ... London, Printed for I. Wright, 1626.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.

place.placeName: his shop without Newgate at the signe of the Bible.
